product.name: Lucky Lady
product.desc: Women don’t like roses, they looovve them! This gorgeous array of light pink and creme roses in a dazzling clear glass vase is guaranteed to win her heart several times over. Love will definitely bloom. This luscious bouquet includes light pink roses, pink roses, crème roses, pink spray roses and variegated pittosporum. Delivered in a beautiful glass vase. Approximately 19&quot; W x 22 1/2&quot; H
